nodes.text: Presteen was a trade world located in the Presteen system of the Senex sector, a part of the Senex-Juvex region in the Western Reaches portion of the Mid Rim. The Senex-Juvex Loop hyperlane linked it to the Caltinia and Veron systems. Presteen was under the control of the lesser nobles of House Araba, based on the nearby planet of Cyimarra.

By 3 ABY, Queen Sula of Presteen traveled to the Cloud City, a floating metropolis located in the clouds of the Outer Rim Territories planet Bespin. There she participated in a high-stakes sabacc game against players including Cloud City's Baron Administrator, Lando Calrissian; the Hutt Corugg; and Imperial Moff Elior.

Presteen was introduced in the Rebellion Era Sourcebook, published in 2001 for use with the Wizards of the Coast Star Wars Roleplaying Game. The 2009 reference book The Essential Atlas placed the world in grid square L-17.
